What will happen to the business if you fall sick (=become ill) or die?

I have been sick with flu.
sick.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who is sick does things that are strange and cruel, and seems mentally ill
sick.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I keep getting obscene phone calls from some sick pervert.

sick.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I don’t want to hear any of your sick jokes, thank you.
sick.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: used by young people to say that something is very impressive and they admire it a lot
